Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Everyone agrees recycling is a good thing in concept. Why do public schools not teach “how to recycle”?What good are bins without knowledge?
clean_text: AGREES RECYCLING GOOD CONCEPT PUBLIC SCHOOLS TEACH RECYCLE”WHAT GOOD BINS KNOWLEDGE
